combination.description: Short codes for the CPC questions

additionalItems.description: Additional questions that might be asked

individualId.description: The individual ID of the examiner

costCode.description: Cost centre code for the test centre

candidate.description: Details of the candidate booked into the test slot

candidateId.description: The id of the test candidate

driverNumber.description: The candidate's driver number, typically (though not always) 16 characters if UK, or 8 digits if NI

dateOfBirth.description: The candidate's date of birth, formatted as an ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD)

gender.description: The gender of an individual, limited to 'M' or 'F' as per TARS master data

primaryTelephone.description: The candidate's primary telephone number, if any (and consent to leave voicemail has been given)

secondaryTelephone.description: The candidate's secondary telephone number, if any (and consent to leave voicemail has been given)

mobileTelephone.description: The candidate's mobile telephone number, if any (and consent to leave voicemail has been given)

emailAddress.description: The candidate's email address, if any

prn.description: The candidate's ADI PRN (potential register number), if an ADI test

previousADITests.description: The number of previous test attempts, if an ADI test

ethnicityCode.description: A character between A and G representing different categories of ethnicity

applicationReference.description: The full application identifier, including applicationId, bookingSequence and checkDigit

applicationId.description: Unique identifier for each test application

bookingSequence.description: Booking sequence number of the test application

checkDigit.description: Reference checksum for the test application

testSlotAttributes.description: The additional attributes of the test slot such as Slot Id, Category, Start Time, etc.

slotId.description: Unique identifier for the journal test slot

start.description: Start time of the test slot

vehicleTypeCode.description: A short alpha (and sometimes numeric) code describing the vehicle type in vehicle slot type

welshTest.description: Whether the test is to be conducted using the welsh language

specialNeeds.description: Whether the candidate has any special needs that require the D255 form to be completed

extendedTest.description: Whether this is an extended test

examinerVisiting.description: Whether the examiner conducting the test slot is visiting a test centre that's not their home test centre

entitlementCheck.description: Indicates whether the examiner needs to check the candidates entitlement evidence(e.g. test application has not been checked with DVLA)

fitMarker.description: Indicates whether the candidate has previously had a fraud marker set against them

categoryEntitlementCheck.description: Indicates whether the examiner needs to check the candidates entitlement based on new legislation around booking vocational categories

previousCancellation.description: The details of any previous test cancellations

items.description: The reason for the previous test cancellation

slotType.description: A description of the types of test intended to be conducted in this slot (e.g. Standard Test / Extended Special Needs Test)

journalData.description: Data brought through from the journal

costCode.description: Cost centre code for the test centre

applicationReference.description: The full application identifier, including applicationId, bookingSequence and checkDigit

applicationId.description: Unique identifier for each test application

bookingSequence.description: Booking sequence number of the test application

checkDigit.description: Reference checksum for the test application

signature.description: Base 64 encoded binary data representing a PNG image of the candidates signature

communicationMethod.description: The method of communication by which the candidate agrees to receive their results

conductedLanguage.description: The language in which a candidate agrees to perform a test

updatedEmail.description: The email address that the candidate agrees their results can be sent to

communicationMethod.description: The method of communication by which the candidate agrees to receive their results

conductedLanguage.description: The language in which a candidate agrees to perform a test

insuranceDeclarationAccepted.description: Whether or not the candidate has declared that their test vehicle has a valid insurance policy

residencyDeclarationAccepted.description: Whether or not the candidate has declared that they have lived in the UK for a period acceptable for taking the test

preTestSignature.description: Base 64 encoded binary data representing a PNG image of the candidates signature

candidateDeclarationSigned.description: Whether or not the candidate signature had been recorded for delegated tests

accompaniment.description: Indicators for anybody else overseeing the test

supervisor.description: Indicates whether a DVSA supervisor was present during the test

interpreter.description: Indicates whether an interpreter was present during the test

healthDeclarationAccepted.description: Whether or not the candidate has declared that their health status hasn't changed since their last application

passCertificateNumberReceived.description: Indicates whether the candidate acknowledges receipt of the PCN

postTestSignature.description: Base 64 encoded binary data representing a PNG image of the candidates signature

identification.description: Indicates which form of ID was provided by the candidate

testSummary.description: Recording of other characteristics of the test

trueLikenessToPhoto.description: Physical appearance resembles a true likeness to provided ID

debriefWitnessed.description: Indicates whether anybody else (e.g. ADI) was present for the debrief

identification.description: Indicates which form of ID was provided by the candidate

D255.description: Indicates whether a D255 form needs to be completed

additionalInformation.description: Any comments that the DE wants to record about the test

categoryCode.description: Category code for the test report

activityCode.description: Code representing the result of the test

gender.description: The gender of an individual, limited to 'M' or 'F' as per TARS master data

transfer.description: Recording of if a rekey was due to a transfer

ipadIssue.description: Recording of if a rekey was due to a iPad issue

technicalFault.description: If the iPad was not used due to a technical fault

lost.description: If the iPad was not used as it has been lost

stolen.description: If the iPad was not used as it has been stolen

broken.description: If the iPad was not used as it is broken

other.description: Recording of if a rekey was due to a different reason

reason.description: The reason this option was selected
